title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Kiro in action: Red Team tactics at scale (DEV336)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Kiro 实战：大规模红队战术 (DEV336)
abstract: In this session we'll show how Kiro helps Red Teamers build the tools they need to move faster and smarter in the cloud. If you’ve ever struggled to get visibility across dozens of AWS accounts or needed to quickly generate recon scripts, Kiro can help you automate and accelerate that process. We'll go beyond prompt engineering and dive into context engineering and spec-driven development, showing how to use spec files to build a custom pentesting toolkit.
